item.title: OpenBangla Keyboard 1.2.0 - Released!
item.author: openbanglateam@gmail.com (OpenBangla Team)
item.description: We’re proudly announcing the release of OpenBangla Keyboard version 1.2.0, an Open Source Bengali input method. This release is mainly an bug fix release. This release fixes a long standing bug #8. For which OpenBangla Keyboard always crashed when writing arO, bistarito etc words using Avro Phonetic method. In this release, we are distributing installation packages for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 17.04. Users can download those packages from releases page.
